title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8155.01 - City of Mount Vernon
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8155.01 - City of Mount Vernon

State Regulations
(a) Route 22. The northbound and southbound roadways of Route 22 between CR 70 (Pelham

Parkway) and the New York city line, provided that this route shall only be
used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (b) South Third Avenue. The northbound and
southbound roadways of South Third Avenue between Route 22 and Roslyn Place, provided that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7
a.m. (c) Roslyn Place. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Roslyn Place between South Third Avenue and
the ABF Terminal, provided that this route shall only be used between the hours
of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (d) Dock

Street. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Dock Street between the Yellow

Freight terminal and Route 22, provided that this route shall only be used
between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8155.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
